mapper.insert: insert into hotel_reservation(hotelId, hotelCode, hotelRoomCode, hotelCheckIn, hotelCheckOut) VALUES(#{hotelId}, #{hotelCode}, #{hotelRoomCode}, #{hotelCheckIn}, #{hotelCheckOut})
mapper.select: select hotelRoomCode, hotelCheckIn, hotelCheckOut from hotel_reservation where hotelCode = #{hotelCode}

select a.hotelId, c.hotelName, c.hotelAdd, c.hotelTel, b.hotelGrade, b.hotelPrice*(a.hotelCheckOut-a.hotelCheckIn) hotelPrice, a.hotelCheckIn, a.hotelCheckOut from hotel_reservation a, hotel_room b, hotel_name c where a.hotelRoomCode = b.hotelRoomCode and a.hotelCode = c.hotelCode and a.hotelId = #{hotelId}
select hotelCheckOut - hotelCheckIn from hotel_reservation where hotelId = #{hotelId}
